members.name: baseAmount

constantValues: Shows the total price of the order product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

members.description: Shows the total price of the order product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the order product, such as manufacturing details or acceptable substitutions.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the order product, such as manufacturing details or acceptable substitutions.

members.name: extendedAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due for the order product, based on the sum of the unit price, quantity, discounts, and tax.

members.description: Shows the total amount due for the order product, based on the sum of the unit price, quantity, discounts, and tax.

members.name: extendedAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

members.name: isCopied

members.description: Select whether the invoice line item is copied from another item or data source.

members.name: isPriceOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the price per unit is fixed at the value in the specified price list or can be overridden by users who have edit rights to the order product.

members.description: Select whether the price per unit is fixed at the value in the specified price list or can be overridden by users who have edit rights to the order product.

members.name: isProductOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the product exists in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 product catalog or is a write-in product specific to the order.

members.description: Select whether the product exists in the Microsoft Dynamics 365 product catalog or is a write-in product specific to the order.

members.name: lineItemNumber

constantValues: Type the line item number for the order product to easily identify the product in the order and make sure it's listed in the correct sequence.

members.description: Type the line item number for the order product to easily identify the product in the order and make sure it's listed in the correct sequence.

constantValues: Type the manual discount amount for the order product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total on the order.

members.description: Type the manual discount amount for the order product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total on the order.

constantValues: Value of the Manual Discount in base currency.
